## Welcome to my portfolio

I’m a graduate student in the **MS in Statistics (Data Science)** at Baruch College. This site hosts coursework and projects for STA 9750 – Software Tools for Data Analysis.Previously, I worked as an **Underwriter** at **Fora Financial**, focusing on financial analysis and risk assessment. I hold a **Bachelor's degree in Actuarial** Science from Baruch College and a **Bachelor’s in International Business** from Université Paul Valéry in Montpellier, France.

- Interests: Statistical Analysis, Risk Analysis, Predictive Modeling, Probability Theory.

  options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
  install.packages("leaflet")
